1.Name: Cobblestone
1.Description: The most basic resource in the world, Used for multiple things

2.Name: Iron
2.Description: A common resource used in pretty much all recipes, unfortuantly, harder to find than cobblestone

3.Name: Steel
3.Description: A well used resource in making items, harder to come by though

5.Name: Wood
5.Description: Find wood in the wild and craft it into wooden stuff.
